author: wrowe
msg: This fmt requires a corresponding macro for unix apr.h.in, which I threw
out to new-httpd, but have no way to test

author: wrowe
msg: Add working apr_filepath_get/set and apr_filepath_parseroot ports for
win32, and bring the (wrong but current) unix apr_filepath_merge into
the module as the starting point.

author: trawick
msg: The more elaborate check for getnameinfo() sets ac_cv_working_getnameinfo
instead of apr_cv_func_getnameinfo.  The overall have_ipv6 check needs
to take this into account so that IPv6 support can be enabled.

msg: Cleanup the --without-libtool option.  This ensures that the default will
